name: Ayushi Upreti
college: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

education.school: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

projects.name: BlogCraft
projects.description: This web application provides CRUD functionality, allowing users create, read, update, and delete records stored in a MongoDB database. Integrated bcrypt for secure password encryption to ensure data privacy. Implemented JWT (JSON Web Tokens) authentication for user authentication and authorization. Utilized Fs (File System) and V4uuid libraries for file handling and generating unique identifiers respectively. Tested and debugged APIs using Postman to ensure functionality and reliability.

projects.name: CrptoDigest
projects.description: Cryptodigest is an app that offers a wealth of information on every cryptocurrency currently available. The application is built using ReactJS, a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces with full responsive functionality. This ReactJS application showcases the integration of the CoinGecko API using Axios, enabling the retrieval and utilization of cryptocurrency data within a modern and responsive user interface.

projects.name: My Portfolio
projects.description: My portfolio website, developed using ReactJS, Tailwind CSS for styling and Framer Motion for scroll-based animations. Incorporated Framer Motion, a cutting-edge animation library, to enhance the user experience while scrolling through the website. With the combination of ReactJS, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion, my portfolio website offers a visually appealing, interactive and modern web experience.

experiences.description: Designed and Developed Webpages: Successfully created and maintained multiple responsive webpages, using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, ensuring compatibility across various devices and browsers. Debugged and Troubleshooted Issues: Identified and resolved technical issues and bugs, ensuring smooth and error-free operation of the webpages. Collaborated with Cross-Functional Teams: Worked closely with designers, content creators, and other developers to translate project requirements into functional web applications.
